龡龡龡

龡字的基本解释

龡
chuī
古同“吹”。

龡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuī］
［《廣韻》昌垂切，平支，昌。］
“龡1”的今字。
(1)撮口用力出气。
(2)吹奏管乐器。
(3)空气流动触拂物体。
(4)传播；传送。
(5)夸口；吹嘘。
(6)抽鸦片烟。
(7)事情不成功；交情破裂。
(8)燃烧；点燃。
(9)推动。
(10)通“炊”。
[②]［chuì］
［《廣韻》尺僞切，去寘，昌。］
(1)管乐器的吹奏。
(2)指管乐器。
(3)管乐之声。
(4)指风。

龡字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【龠字部】　龡； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1538第27
【正字通】吹本字。【釋名】竹曰吹。吹，推也。以氣推發其聲也。【周禮·春官·籥師】掌敎國子舞羽龡籥。【籥章】中春龡豳，詩以逆暑。　【說文】作?。【玉篇】作䶴。見後䶴字註。隷作吹。

龡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
龡字的起名意思

暂无。

Shan
Basic explanation of words
Shan
chuī
Gu Tong "blows."
Shan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chuī]
["Guangyun" Chang vertical cut, flat branch, Chang. ]
The present character for "龡1".
(1) Pinch the mouth and give out forcefully.
(2) Playing wind instruments.
(3) The air flow touches the object.
(4) Spread; transmit.
(5) Boasting; bragging.
(6) Smoking opium.
(7) Things are unsuccessful; friendship is broken.
(8) Burn; ignite.
(9) Push.
(10) Through "cooking".
[②]［chuì］
["Guangyun" ruler pseudo-cut, go to set, Chang. ]
(1) The playing of wind instruments.
(2) Refers to wind instruments.
(3) The sound of wind music.
(4) Refers to the wind.
Shan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Department of 龠字] 　龡; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1538 27
【Zhengzitong】Blow the original character. 【Release name】Bamboo said to blow. Blow, push too. Push his voice with air. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Shi Shi】The Wu Yu Yan, the son of the country, is in charge of the dance. 【Xizhang】In the middle of the spring, the poem is used to overcome the heat.　[Said the text] for?. [Jade articles] Composer. See Houqi word note. Li Zuo blowing.
Shan
